law.catch_line: Criminal background investigations -- Duties of corporation or its security division.

text.section: The Department of Kentucky State Police shall, at the request of the division of security, perform full criminal background investigations on all potential vendors and potential employees of the corporation at the level of division director and above and at any level within the division of security. The corporation shall reimburse the Department of Kentucky State Police for the actual costs of such investigations.

law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 163, effective June 26, 2007. -- Created 1988 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 19, effective December 15, 1988.
